titleStmt.title: The case of England, and the Protestant interest
Present case of England, and the Protestant interest
titleStmt.author: Defoe, Daniel, 1661?-1731.

notesStmt.note: First issued as 'The present case of England, and the Protestant interest'.
The second line of text ends: "and a"; the fourth ends: "Hearts,".
In this issue the final paragraph (p. 4) has the words beginning "and in the words of our liturgy, ..." as mentioned in Moore 34a.
Copy filmed at UMI microfilm Early English Books 1641-1700 reel 2474 has print show through, affecting text.
Reproduction of original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
